yes, my spouse ( and i have heard a few others here)  that dont care for the spook-tacular nature of our work.
  oh well- its just not for the faint-of-heart.....
  (see how brave we all are?) hehehehe ;)
  Charm

Isobael <isobael@...> wrote:
          Thanks!

I downloaded them both and Goldwave is MUCH easier to use. I'll play
around with it and see if I can clean up my clips.

It's nice to have this group. My husband wants nothing to do with
this and won't even listen to what I've found. Having people listen
and verify and help out is great!

Sandie

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Pridegrl Neverumind
<charmedbyu20032003@...> wrote:
>
> hi Sandie!
> 
> I am Charm.
> 
> the knowledgeable folks round here advised me to use Goldwave or
speechpro clear voice denoiser ( i love that one) its a free download
on speechpro.com and it works- well, like a charm! ( hehe)
> good luck and welcome to the group :)
> Charm
